title.en: My Daughter Is the Final Boss

altTitles.fr: Ma fille est le boss final

altTitles.it: Mia figlia è il boss finale

altTitles.zh: 我的女儿是最终的老板

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的女兒是最終的老闆

altTitles.es-la: Mi Hija es el Jefe Final

description.en:
Lee Seojun could only watch as his daughter, the witch Lee Seola, turned into the wicked final boss who destroyed the world and brought upon his death. Though never a good dad, as he loses consciousness, Seojun gets a new quest: "Change the Future." Upon awakening, he sees a 5-year-old Seola standing before him. Now, Seojun must raise Seola to avoid the misfortunes that originally turned her wicked and become the caring father she never had. The price of failure? Only the end of the world.

---
My daughter destroyed the world. At the end of the divergence, I died helplessly. When I opened my eyes again, my five-year-old daughter was in front of me.

*Unique Quest: Changing the Future*
Stop Seol-ah Lee's five misfortunes. (0/5) 

I was given another chance. If I raised her incorrectly, the world will perish.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59097539)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/my-daughter-is-the-final-boss/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16387)
* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/441)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/115453)
description.fr:
Ma fille a détruit le monde. À la fin de celui-ci, je suis mort impuissant. Quand j'ai rouvert les yeux, ma fille de cinq ans était devant moi. <Quête unique : Changer le futur> Arrêtez les cinq malheurs de Seol-Ah Lee. (0/5) Une nouvelle chance m'a été accordée. Si elle est mal éduquée, le monde périra.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59097539)

* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16387)
* [French / Français](https://piccoma.com/fr/product/441)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/115453)
description.id:
Putriku menghancurkan dunia ini, di akhir hidupku aku mati tidak berdaya. Ketika aku membuka mata, putriku yang berusia 5 tahun berada di hadapanku. Aku mengalami regresi dan harus mencegah 5 nasib buruk Seol-Ah (0/5) Aku diberikan kesempatan sekali lagi, untuk mengubah semuanya dan menebus semua kesalahanku di masa lalu Jika dibiarkan begitu saja, maka dunia akan binasa. - Diary Lee Seojun

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59097539)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/115453)
description.ko:
내 딸이 세상을 멸망시켰다.
엇나감의 끝에서, 나는 무력하게 죽음을 맞이했다.
다시 눈을 떴을 때, 내 눈앞에는 다섯 살의 딸이 있었다.

<고유 퀘스트 : 미래 바꾸기>
이설아의 다섯 가지 불행을 막으십시오.(0/5)

다시 한번 주어진 기회.
잘못 키우면, 세상이 멸망한다.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59097539)

description.ru:
Моя дочь разрушила мир. В конце её дивергенции я беспомощно умер.
Когда снова открыл глаза, передо мной стояла моя пятилетняя дочь.
[Остановите пять несчастий Соль-а Ли. (0/5)]
Мне дали ещё один шанс. Если её неправильно воспитать, то мир погибнет.

---

description.uk:
Моя донька зруйнувала світ, а я помер. Але після смерті перед моїми очима з'явилось завдання.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59097539)

description.zh:
我的女儿灭亡了世界。 就在生死毁灭之际，我无力的迎接死亡的到来。 再次睁开双眼的时候，我回到了过去，眼前竟出现了女儿5岁时的身影！

---

title.en: Master of the Resurgence of Spiritual Energy

description.en: The resurgence of spiritual energy on Earth. Shen An receives a message from his future self and embarks on an invincible path! Shen An wants to keep a low profile, but the beautiful women around him won't allow it!

title.en: The Ranker's Guide to Live an Ordinary Life

altTitles.en: A Guide to the Right Life for Rankers

description.en:
The first S-class Awakened is really a third-rate student?!

In the 21st century, the world became a 'fantasy'. In a South Korea filled with despair, S-classes have descended! The greatest of them - Witch Queen Jyo!

"Goddess Jyo... Queen Jyo... Who are you...? Who could it be?"

The true identity of the savior who has been shrouded in mystery for 10 years. Her identity? Gyung Jyo, a third-rate student, who's unable to make outgoing calls due to her mother's anger.and on the verge of being strangled and trapped in the abyss.

She was leading a peaceful and ordinary life as Korea's top unemployed person, however...

[The rankings are being updated.]
[Your current ranking has dropped to 2nd place.] 

"!?"

"I know who you are, Witch Queen."

Baek Dohyun, a regressor, appears in front of Gyung Jyo!

Will Gyung Jyo, an S-class Munchkin ranker, be able to maintain her comfortable and lazy tyrant life, as her well-rolling life turns upside down into the position of the world's savior?

Human genes mutate, those with extraordinary genes may gain superpowers, and those with monster genes may mutate into monsters. Xingcun, who became a monster, was awakened and later reborn after the sacrifice of the heroine. In this life, the prodigal son shall use the mutation to fight back and protect the heroine. While he may lay hidden among the supermen, and he shall secretly use his mutation to hunt monsters, seize the power of the ancient demon god, and prevent his resurrection.

At the young age of twenty, Seol Mudok, a master swordsman, became the Lord of the Northern Sea Ice Palace. Plunged into despair after the death of his lover, he discovers that with the legendary flower, the “Lotus of Love,” that his deceased lover has been reincarnated. In his quest, he descends into another world…
description.fr: À l’âge de vingt ans, Seol Mudok, un maître de l’épée, est devenu le seigneur du Palais des glaces de la mer du Nord. Plongé dans le désespoir après la mort de son amante, il découvre qu’avec la fleur légendaire, le « Lotus de l’Amour », sa défunte amante s’est réincarné. Dans sa quête, il descend dans un autre monde…

altTitles.zh: 重生不当舔王，我独自氪金升级

altTitles.en: I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp
Rebirth Without Being the Licking King, I Use Cash to Level Up

altTitles.vi: Trọng Sinh Không Làm Chạn Vương, Tôi Một Mình Nạp Game Thăng Cấp

description.en: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title.ja-ro: Tensei Kyuuketsuki-san wa Ohirune ga Shitai

altTitles.en: A Transmigration Vampire would like to take a Nap

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kyuuketsukisan wa Ohirune ga Shitai

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Vampire Wants an Afternoon Nap

altTitles.ja: 転生吸血鬼さんはお昼寝がしたい

description.en:
A polite and lethargic boy was reincarnated in another world as a vampire bishoujo. In this world of swords and magic, this protagonist who was reborn replete with all kinds of cheat powers was searching for one thing??!

"Three meals a day, snacks and an afternoon nap, I guess."

Are you really the protagonist!? And thus begins the fantasy comedy of a vampire looking for the ideal moocher lifestyle.

"I’m... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!

Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

Do gods play dice with the fate of entire cities? 

Yul Choi’s city is suddenly transported to become a piece in a board game of the gods. Just when Yul thinks he can work together with people to overcome the monsters and challenges, he realizes he must become the city’s greatest villain to save the city.

Can Yul rise to the demanding task of becoming the greatest and most villainous hero his city has ever seen?
description.ko:
어느날 갑자기 신들의 게임에 소환된 도시 최율은 첫지급 보상으로 모든 게임의 공략을 보여주는 '독식의 제물 크라시나 서'를 습득한다.

그러나, 아이템의 능력은 공략을 공유한 모든 이들의 보상을 독식하는 것!

양날 검의 아이템을 얻은 최율은 이 게임에서 끝까지 살아남을 수 있을 것인가!

title.en: Avenger of Mystical Eyes - Blood Parasite

altTitles.ja: 魔眼の復讐者 ブラッドパラサイト

description.en: "Would you like to be part of my family?" Archive, the devil race's weakest, was saved by the Demon Queen right before death overtook him. Unable to have children and capable of harming anything that approaches him, Archive is the only member of the Demon Queen's "family" that continues living. However, demons and humans hate each other, and they are fighting wars at the cost of each other's peace. Eight heroes lure the Demon Queen with promises of peace to defeat her. Archive could only stand by and watch as the weakened Demon Queen fell into the trap and then abused. Archive goes to help, but as the weakest demon, he has no way to fight back and meets his end as his head was severed from his body. The Demon Queen is then sealed away. Unable to protect the Demon Queen, Archive used every ounce of his strength to cast a certain spell on one of the eight heroes, Lieselotte. [Forbidden magic that kills and takes over the soul of a fetus called Blood Parasite]. By using this magic, Archive managed to take over Lieselotte's fetus, as she was already pregnant. Reborn from the weakest demon into the son of a hero, Archive would eventually display "Demon eyes." Petrification, Charm, Fear, Clairvoyance, along with other powers that became available to Archive, who had obtained the most powerful demon eyes. Archive vows revenge on the heroes, even if it was his own mother who gave birth to him, or the lover who loved him when he was a teenager. “Just you wait, heroes, I shall kill you and take back the Demon Queen!”

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

Eva, a long-lived witch, takes in Fernest kingdom’s youngest prince, Louis, when she is asked to heal the eldest prince of an illness. Although witches are traditionally despised, Louis forms a close bond with her. When Louis is called back to the palace by a strange twist of fate to take his father's place on the throne, Eva must decide whether to let him go or follow.
description.pt-br: Eva é uma bruxa que vive muito tempo, ela é chamada para curar Louis, o futuro rei de fernest, de uma doença. As bruxas sempre foram desprezadas, mas isso não impediu Louis de continuar a visitá-la mesmo depois de estar curado. Quando Louis é chamado de volta ao palácio para tomar seu lugar como herdeiro do trono, Eva deve decidir se vai deixá-lo ir ou levá-lo de volta. Qual será a decisão de Eva?

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Striving for the Luxury Liner!! Get that Rich Isekai Life with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

title.en: The Story of a Scary Consignee

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Haitatsu-saki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi

altTitles.es-la: La Historia de un destinatario aterrador

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cô nàng nhận hàng đáng sợ

description.en: An introverted part-time food delivery guy working in the countryside receives a food delivery order. When he reaches the delivery address, he discovers that the recipient is a tall and intimidating-like woman. However, as the story unfolds, he eventually discovers…
description.es-la: Un introvertido repartidor de comida a tiempo parcial que trabaja en el campo recibe un pedido de comida a domicilio. Cuando llega a la dirección de entrega, descubre que la destinataria es una mujer alta y de aspecto intimidatorio. Sin embargo, a medida que avanza la historia, descubrirá que...

description.en: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.

description.en:
They didn’t seem happy to have a stranger visit them, they were more than ready for it.
From that day on, the villagers disappeared day by day.
myeong visits gwichon ri village and hides in his grandmother’s empty house, but finds it strangely clean.
His grandmother died three years ago, was it an accident or does it have something to do with the village?

title.en: All Four Seasons of the Keyaki Sisters

altTitles.en: All four seasons of the Keyaki sisters.

description.en: Follows the daily life of the 4 Keyaki sisters. Mutsumi, the oldest sister, is an excellent cook and has a loud voice. The second oldest, Akemi, is a beauty who likes to read books. The third, Izumi, is a cheerful and straightfoward sporty girl. Hitomi, the youngest sister, is a tidy and graceful girl who is good at knitting.

altTitles.ja: よつもじ。〜今日も、明日も〜

altTitles.vi: Bốn từ: Hôm nay, Ngày mai

altTitles.en: Feast of the Valkyries: ~Cooking with Shirabe~

description.en: An official spinoff of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series! The divas' next battlefield is a warm gourmet comedy with the chief kitchen maid, Shirabe! Another Symphogear ballad, fresh from the kitchen.

altTitles.ja: 女魔王様はゆうしゃくんを倒せない。

altTitles.en: The Demon Queen Can't Defeat Yuusha-kun.

description.en:
Demon Queen Abyss is worried… She's not able to defeat the Hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young man—he should be easy to defeat! … However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss's true identity, considers her his “Master” and has become very fond of her…!?
___
Produced with the help of and supervised by [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline).
description.pt-br: A Rainha Demônio Abyss está preocupada... ela não é capaz de derrotar o herói, considerado o inimigo mortal dos demônio. Esse herói ainda é um jovem inexperiente — ele deveria ser fácil de derrotar! ... Todavia, o problema é que ele, não conhecendo a verdadeira identidade de Abyss, a considera sua "Mestra" e gosta muito dela...!?

description.en: When Wen Yifan returned to her hometown for work, she met the rumoured “First-Class Handsome Guy” in a bar, but he turned out to be Sang Yan, whom she hurt and rejected in high school! In a twist of fate, the two people who could never get along kept bumping into each other. They even rented the same unit by chance and became housemates! Unspoken feelings refusing to see the light of day, strong emotions stirring beneath it all… Let’s see how Sang Yan, the “Peak Ideal Boyfriend” interprets and expresses deep affections and sweet love!

The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

description.en:
Chako Hananoki thought she'd found happiness in a handsome fiancé, but when she realized a marriage to him would mean a total erasure of herself, she broke it off and moved back into her childhood home in the country—only to find a strange man and young woman living there? She finds a way to coexist with them, but when her stalker fiancé follows her home, she declares to him (and accidentally to the whole village as well) that this new man in her life is her husband?! A dramatic fake-marriage, found-family story for the ages. 

(Source: Kodansha)

Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

description.en: Shin Young-jun, a sergeant chef, was greeted by the apocalypse just days before vacation. The battalion turned into chaos in an instant, and the communication network was cut off. Then something appeared before his eyes! [Congratulations on your awakening!] [Job: Novice Chef Lv.1] If I had been a warrior or an assassin, I would have tried to stand alone... What was assigned to him was chef, which is obviously a support job. There's nothing to be done if it's like this. "From here on, I will feed you."
description.ko:
말년 휴가를 며칠 앞둔 취사병 병장 신영준에게 멸망이 찾아왔다.
삽시간에 아비규환이 되어 버린 대대, 끊어져 버린 연락망.
눈 앞에 보이는 것은 하나!
[각성을 축하드립니다!][직업 : 신입 요리사 Lv.1]
차라리 전사, 암살자 같은 직업이었다면 홀로서기라도 시도해 보았을 것을…
그에게 주어진 것은 누가 봐도 서포터 직업인 요리사...

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントキリング

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

title.en: World Teacher – Other World Style Education & Agent

altTitles.ru: World Teacher: Иной мир образования и шпионажа
World Teacher: Обучение по заветам другого мира
Мировой учитель: Иной мир образования и шпионажа
Мировой учитель: Наставник из иного мира
Мировой учитель: Образование и шпионаж иного мира

altTitles.ja: ワールド・ティーチャー -異世界式教育エージェント-

description.en:
A man who was once called the world’s strongest agent ended up becoming a teacher after his retirement, to train a new generation of agents. After many years of training his disciples, he was killed at the age of 60 by a secret organization’s ruse and was reincarnated in another world with his memories intact. Though he was surprised by the existence of magic and the strange species in that world, he quickly adapted to his condition as a newborn and took advantage of it. He acquired special magic and gained a massive amount of strength thanks to his rigorous discipline, in order to reach his goal: Resume his career as a teacher which he left halfway through in his previous life.  
  
This is the story of a man, who, based on the memories and the experiences of his previous life, became a teacher who travels through the world with his students.  
  
Adaptation of a Light Novel.  
  


---
description.ru:
Некогда сильнейший агент, Сириус, пожертвовав собой ради товарищей, переродился в другом мире.  
  
Не успев закончить подготовку своих преемников в прошлом мире, он, вооружившись оставшимися знаниями и опытом, берётся учить окружающих его людей и круто меняет всю их жизнь. Для одних он станет наставником, а для других — быть может, чем-то большим…  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In Russian by/на русском [Istari Comics Publishing/Истари комикс](https://readmanga.live/world_teacher__other_world_style_education___agent)

description.en: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

Junghyuk, an incubus who has become insensitive, could not feed on human essence, leading to starvation. Without any expectation, he went to a club and had a one-night stand with a man who had a different kind of taste to him... "I wonder...how different an incubus is compared to a human." But it turns out that guy is Seohee, the biggest playboy and a junior from the same University! Although he didn't have many options except to become his sex partner, he can't figure out how far Seohee will take this relationship!

Long, long ago in Neraland, the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.  
Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them, she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.  
However…
description.fr:
Il y a fort longtemps au royaume de Nera, les fidèles humains érigèrent une tour en signe de leur respect pour leur déesse Nera.  
La déesse Nera, profondément touchée par la foi de ces derniers, ouvrit une porte au sommet de la tour pour les récompenser. Cette porte mystique était connectée à un autre monde. Elle fut dénommée *l'Œil céleste*.  
Mais un jour…
description.uk:
Давним-давно в Нераланді благочестиві люди побудували велику вежу, в знак поваги до своєї богині Нери.   
Богиня Нера була глибоко зворушена людським благочестям; щоб нагородити їх, вона відчинила двері на верхівці вежі. Ці ефірні двері пов'язані з іншим світом; І були відомі як *Райське Око*.  
Однак…  


---
description.zh: 很久以前，诺拉大陆的人类为了表示对诺拉女神最崇高的敬意，筑起了一座宏伟的高塔。 女神为人们的虔诚所动， 在高塔的顶端打开了一扇通往异世的大门。 来自另一个世界的羽族人为人类带来了文明与进步，但最终两族人在各种矛盾下刀戈相向。 战后数百年过去了，大陆再一次笼罩在不安与诡异的阴云中...
description.pt-br:
Há muito, muito tempo atrás em Neraland, o piedoso humano construiu uma grande torre para mostrar o respeito à sua deusa Nera.

Deusa Nera ficou comovida pela piedade humana; para recompensá-los, ela abriu uma porta no topo da torre. Esta porta etérea conectada a outro mundo; era conhecida como "Olho do Paraíso". 

 Contudo...

altTitles.th: เกมกลคนอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
description.pt-br: O estudante Yugi Mutou passou a maior parte de seu tempo sozinho jogando jogos - até que ele resolveu o Enigma do Milênio, um artefato egípcio misterioso! Possuída pelo quebra-cabeça, Yugi se torna o Yu-Gi-Oh(O Rei dos Jogos), e irá enfrentar os desafios dos Jogos das Sombras - Jogos mortais com grandes apostas e altos riscos, como apostar a sua alma e a alma de seus queridos amigos! O mangá contém novas histórias não vistas no anime, incluindo a origem de Yugi e seus amigos!

title.en: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Exorcist: Okumura Yukio no Aishū

altTitles.en: Salaryman Exorcist: The Sorrows of Okumura Yukio

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Futsumashi Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja: サラリーマン祓魔師 奥村雪男の

description.en: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.

Sora, a young actor who for his charisma and great talent in acting, has had a great increase of popularity. But the real personality of Sora, is a simple high school student, Hishino Rikuto! One day, a classmate from the same school, Kamizaka Kakeru, sees through his disguise of Rikuto and recognizes him as Sora and, to make the boy shut his mouth, kissed him by force. Kakeru was innocent, contrary to Rikuto who was more than used to kissing for his work. Thing, which makes Kakeru upset and confused. But it was that innocence that eventually caught Rikuto's attention. A secret love that no one else should know. Let the play begin!

title.en: Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation - Mo Dao Zu Shi

altTitles.pt-br: Mo Dao Zu Shi - O Fundador da Cultivação Demoníaca

description.en:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei WuXian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan WangJi, his archenemy.  
  
This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei WuXian slowly realizes that Lan WangJi, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei WuXian than he is letting on.
description.pl:
Wei Wuxian, założyciel demonicznej sekty, przemierzał świat w swój rozpustny sposób, znienawidzony przez miliony za chaos, który wywołał. Ostatecznie został zdradzony przez swojego najdroższego shidi i zamordowany przez potężne klany, które złączyły siły, by go pokonać. Po kilkunastu latach ocknął się w ciele szaleńca, który został porzucony przez rodzinę. Niedługo później siłą zostaje przygarnięty przez Lan Wangji, jego arcywroga. Tak rozpoczyna się trzymająca w napięciu i wywołująca śmiech wędrówka złożona z pokonywania potworów i rozwiązywania tajemnic. I kto im zabroni trochę poflirtować po drodze?  
  
[Tłumaczenie powieści](https://dracaena.webd.pl/portfolio/mo-dao-zu-shi/)

description.en: Hiroshi Shinanogawa is a teenager who loves to read delinquent manga. He wants to be a badass like the guys in his favorite comics: "Rokudenashi BLUES", "Shounan Bousouzoku," "Crows" and "WORST." In his last summer of middle school, he decides to become a delinquent. He leaves his prestigious private school and drops out to start living as a delinquent. Now he is a member of the gang that rules Komae Kita Middle School, hiding the fact that he is a rookie delinquent. He stays and fights together with Iguchi Tatsuya, a leader of a gang and a delinquent Hiroshi idolizes.
description.pt-br: Hiroshi Shinanogawa é um aluno modelo que está cansado de sua vida monótona e entediante. Ele sai de uma escola particular para uma escola pública, a Escola Secundária Komae, com apenas uma coisa em mente: se tornar um delinquente, como nos mangás. Em seu primeiro dia, ele é abordado por Iguchi Tatsuya e sua gangue de delinquentes. Agora começa a jornada de Hiroshi pelo mundo dos marginais.

altTitles.ja: 吠える犬とくびったけ

description.en:
This is a world where demi-humans and humans co-exist. 
Kou, a vampire and werewolf mix, developed a dislike for humans after a certain incident in his childhood. They looked delectable to him, so he thought that it'd be best if he kept his distance and stayed away from them as much as possible. 
"I've missed you!" 
But his world is flipped on its head when he reunites with the guy who triggered his instincts. He can't resist his instincts as his childhood friend, Itsuki, shows up in his life again, acting as if nothing’s changed. He knows that giving in will make him lose himself, but...! 
(cheerful x tsundere) A reunion BL between a human and demi-human childhood friends!

Our story begins with Jigyo, the crown prince, having recently been exiled from the palace with a guard, Dangeum, and the man who raised him, Chunggeum. The three are forced to pass their remaining days in a quiet village made up of mostly elderly residents. This leads to a listless and lonely Jigyo, who begins pressing Dangeum to relieve his traditional post as a voiceless shadow, and the two quickly grow closer. Hints of a bloody conspiracy, Dangeum’s mysterious origin, and a Chunggeum who seems to know more than he's letting on - just how are these three characters connected, and what will happen to them during exile?
description.es: Nuestra historia comienza con Jigyo, un príncipe heredero, que ha sido exiliado del palacio con un guardia, Dangeum, y el hombre que lo crío, Chunggeum. Los tres son forzados a pasar sus días en una tranquila aldea en la que casi todos sus residentes son gente mayor. Esto nos deja un apático y solitario Jigyo, que comienza a presionar a Dangeum para abandonar su condición de sombra silenciosa, y pronto se vuelven cercanos. Insinuaciones de una sangrienta conspiración, el misterioso origen de Dangeum y un Chunggeum que al parecer sabe más de lo que dice saber… ¿Cómo es que éstos tres personajes están conectados?, ¿Qué pasará con ellos durante su exilio?

description.en:
The “Great God” is a god who takes the form of a beast and is said to bestow “blessings” on the land he visits.

A village in the mountains, where the tradition still exists, was suffering from heavy snowfall that never stops throughout the year. The residents believe that this is due to a lack of offerings to the “Great God,” so they make a decision.

They decided to offer a “slave boy” to the “Great God” as a “human sacrifice”....

A story of “boy” and “beast,” “blessing” and “curse.
description.ja:
獣の姿をして、訪れた土地に“祝福”を授けるとされる神、“大神様”。

その伝承が残る山間の集落は、一年中降りやむことのない豪雪に苦しめられていた。“大神様”への供物が足りないためだと考えた住民はとある決断を下す。

それは“奴隷の少年”を“人身御供”として、“大神様”へ差し出すことだった…。

“少年”と“獣”、そして“祝福”と“呪い”の物語。

altTitles.ja: シャンピニオンの魔女

description.en: Luna, a black witch who lives quietly in a poisonous mushroom house, deep in the Black Forest. She lives in the city making high-efficiency medicine, but it is rumored that one will die if touched by her, and thus she is avoided… The life of a witch who doesn't know the warmth of people is carefully and momentarily drawn.
The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!

title.en: Antique Magical Tools Whisper to Lady Alice: the Case Files of a Royal Antiquarian

altTitles.ja: 骨董魔法具は令嬢アリスに囁く‐王室古物商の事件録‐
Kottou Mahougu wa Reijou Alice ni Sasayaku ‐ Oushitsu Kobutsushou no Jikenroku

description.en: Alice, a magical antiquarian, is involved in a locked-room murder at the royal castle where a tea party is held. The suspect is Tetra Heart, a princess with the right to inherit the throne. She has long been suspected of being a “witch who would destroy the world.” If you are suspected, you must be punished. That is the main principle of the “witch trials.” Not only the clarification of the secret room trick, but also the proof of witchcraft involved is not deemed necessary to determine the guilt. My reasoning will destroy such absurdity! Alice, whose life was once saved by the princess, takes on the case to prove the innocence of the “witch.” Unravel the whispers of the antique magical tools and save the princess from execution for witchcraft, a magical suspense story begins!

title.en: Kinki no Tensei Daimadoushi ~Munou kara Level Up de Saikyou ni~

altTitles.ja: 禁忌の転生大魔導士 ～無能からレベルアップで最強に～

altTitles.en: The Reincarnation of the Forbidden Archmage

description.en: One day, dungeons suddenly appeared. Humans with awakened skills then set out to face these dungeons in search of hope and riches. Our protagonist, Saeki, having no skills, is considered incompetent; in order to earn enough money for the treatment of his little sister with an incurable disease, he decided to become an adventurer. Saeki has a secret, in his previous life he was the most powerful mage. Since his reincarnation he has to level up to regain his former powers. This is the story of an incompetent who will turn the world upside down with his power!

You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

altTitles.es-la: El Sirviente de la Joven Dama

description.en: The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade, and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes, let alone know what to do in the outside world.
description.pt: A história se concentra em um personagem principal que foi criado como mordomo do comércio de sua família e que, um dia, conhece um jovem rica que nem sequer consegue trocar sua própria roupa e, muito menos, saber o que fazer no mundo exterior.
description.es-la: La historia se centra en un personaje principal que fue criado como un mayordomo por la ocupación de su familia, y que un día conoce a una joven rica que no puede siquiera cambiarse la ropa por su propia cuenta, y mucho menos, saber qué hacer en el mundo exterior.

altTitles.en: ผูกใจไว้ใกล้ ๆ เธอ

description.en: A red thread exists between a guy and girl that are fated to be together, a bond that can't be seen by the naked eye. Finally, this fated romantic love will begin to open its curtain.

title.en: Beloved by the Male Lead's Nephew

altTitles.en: The Male Lead's Nephew Loves Me So Much
The Main Male Character's Nephew Really Likes Me

altTitles.id: The Male Lead's Nephew Likes Me So Much
Keponakan male lead suka banget padaku

altTitles.ja: 大公殿下の甥っ子に懐かれてしまいました

altTitles.th: หลานพระเอกสุดแสนจะปลื้มฉัน

description.en:
One day, my life suddenly come to an end, but I reincarnated as a the villainess of a romantic novel who is obsessed with and stalks the male lead, ultimately getting sentenced to death for trying to kill the female lead. I decided to try to avoid that by leaving the capital and living peacefully in the countryside, however, my dad requested that I come back to the capital because there was a huge mess going: it was reported that the royal heir who was believed to have died 7 years ago is actually alive! The little prince also just so happens to be the nephew of the male lead, who is now looking for him!! I didn’t want to get involved with that but unfortunately on my way to the capital, I rescued a little beggar child who turned out to be the lost royal heir and who is now extremely attached to me. In the original story, the female lead was supposed to find him so she could have the opportunity to meet the male lead, but what will happen to my peaceful life now that the original flow of the story seems to be changing?!!

---
After being reborn as a stalker villainess destined to die for trying to kill Archduke Calix Elluiden's lover, Charlize Lienta fled from the capital to stay away from the archduke at all costs. But her plan goes awry when she returns a year later and rescues a poor boy on the streets... because he turns out to be Sasha, Calix's long-lost nephew! Given her infamous reputation as Calix's stalker, will Charlize succeed in returning Sasha without raising the archduke's suspicions?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/58448925)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%A1%B0%EC%B9%B4%EA%B0%80-%EB%82%98%EB%A5%BC-%EB%84%88%EB%AC%B4-%EC%A2%8B%EC%95%84%ED%95%9C%EB%8B%A4/3548), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62000958)
description.fr: Un jour, je me suis souvenue de ma vie d'avant. Ma deuxième vie est dans un roman et je suis une méchante qui est morte d'obsession pour le protagoniste masculin. À ce rythme, j'allai mourir. J'ai donc déménagé à la campagne et vis maintenant calmement. Mais mon père m'a appelée. La capitale devient folle, on dit que l'empereur Seon a disparu... Le petit garçon que j'ai ramassé en pensant à ma vie antérieure était le neveu du premier rôle masculin! Je ne dérangerai plus jamais Votre Altesse. - Je vous ai envoyé cette lettre. Je suis condamnée. *** Étonnamment, il aurait pu être plus ruiné ici. La sculpture du futur dont j'ai été témoin accidentellement était le début. [ 'Oh, je me demande quel genre de visage aura la princesse Rienta. Le père est mort à sa place pour la sauver.' ] Vous devez établir un contact visuel avec le personnage principal masculin à une distance proche.
description.uk: Одного разу я згадала своє попереднє життя. Моє друге життя - в романі. Я була лиходійкою, яка померла через одержимість головним героєм. Аби не загинути, я переїхала в село й живу собі спокійно, і ось якось зі мною зв'язався батько: «Столиця божеволіє. Кажуть, що ерцгерцог шукає загубленого імператора». Хлопчик, якого я підібрала, був племінником головного героя??? "Я більше ніколи не потурбую Вашу Світлість". - Я власноруч написала це. Я приречена!!!

altTitles.en: Noa Is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!
